item.title: I'm moving from Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: I used Wordpress to handle my website. But I have 1 problem with Wordpress, that is the admin dashboard is too overwhelming to use. One day, I discovered Hugo from Eric Murphy’s Website. I looked at the Hugo’s advantages and I found that Hugo is suitable for me. So, today, I’ll be using Hugo to power my website.
Welcome to my website I’m an introvert weeb. I’m a Linux Enthusiast and Audiophile. This website is a place where I post about things that I’m interested in.
